name: Com. ex rel. Derrick BARNES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary Mr. Jeffrey A. Beard, Ph.D., Appellees
name_abbreviation: Com. ex rel. Barnes v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Com. ex rel. Derrick BARNES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary Mr. Jeffrey A. Beard, Ph.D., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of May, 2010, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
996 A.2d 473
Com. ex rel. Derrick BARNES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary Mr. Jeffrey A. Beard, Ph.D., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 26, 2010.
